home.title: Edward Kemp
home.subtitle: Full Stack Engineer
home.description: Experienced full stack engineer specializing in scalable applications and optimizing system performance. Proficient in Node.js, microservices architecture, and RESTful API integration with a strong focus on collaboration and mentorship.

about.heading: About Me
about.text: Passionate about creating innovative solutions and mentoring the next generation of developers. Currently working with cutting-edge technologies at creative agencies and tech companies across London, with a proven track record of delivering scalable applications and optimizing system performance.

skills.heading: Technical Expertise
skills.description: Comprehensive skill set spanning modern frontend frameworks, robust backend technologies, and cloud infrastructure solutions.

entries.description: Led technology selection and delivered cutting-edge digital solutions for a creative WordPress-focused design agency. Built interactive websites using React, Node.js, PHP, and Docker while mentoring junior developers and optimizing backend microservices with PostgreSQL integration.

Designed and delivered scalable full-stack solutions with focus on performance optimization. Developed robust frontend features using React and TypeScript, backend microservices with Node.js and PostgreSQL. Enhanced CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment times by 30% and mentoring junior engineers.

Built modular frontend components with React, Vue.js, and TypeScript, improving code reuse and maintainability. Developed backend features using Python and Node.js, optimized application performance reducing load times by 25%, and maintained robust testing practices for software reliability.

Delivered high-quality applications for both greenfield and legacy projects. Developed dynamic web interfaces using Angular and React, refactored legacy systems to modern frameworks reducing technical debt, and collaborated with infrastructure teams for secure AWS deployments.

contact.heading: Let's Work Together
contact.text: Ready to collaborate on your next project? I'd love to discuss how we can bring your vision to life with modern, scalable solutions.
